document.full_text: a public school teacher sued the texas comptroller's office on behalf of 3.5 million current and former state employees after the comptroller posted the employees' private information on its public website.
document.title: texas state employees sue comptroller over privacy
lines_and_colors: a public school teacher sued the texas comptroller's office on behalf of 3.5 million current and former state employees after the comptroller posted the employees' private information on its public website.
